insert into shopcartdetails (scid, skuid, quantity, price, ticketprice) values (#{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{skuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{ticketprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE})
mapper.update: update shopcartdetails set scid = #{scid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, skuid = #{skuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, ticketprice = #{ticketprice,jdbcType=DOUBLE} where scdid = #{scdid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select scdid, scid, skuid, quantity, price, ticketprice from shopcartdetails
